column5: My daughter and I were up at 4.30 am to make the drive to meet up With life long friends and family at our camping /my fishing spot. We got there at 8.30and I set up the boat and was told to go fishing they would look after Erin. So off I went on the water. Alone  yaaaaaa. Started looking for pike but no luck I tried a few of my go to lures and nothing. Then I tried a lure that I picked up on the way and wouldn't you know it SUCCESS. The Bass were going crazy over it. All in all I landed about 30 -40 in the space of 3.5 hours. I don't  keep fish very often but Sundays breakfast was good. Saturday nite was good but the big ones didn't want to come out and play. Sunday we took the kids out.     Smores and a camp fire.    As for Ziggy RIP.  Looking forward to the August long weekend and we will do this all again. It never gets old. Don.
Awesome !!!! another bass eater. My fav fish to eat. Great report Don!
ahh, now that's  a nice looking Sunday breakfast you got there. Great seeing the big smiles on the kid's faces there while fishing ! Hope your August long weekend trip is as fun as this one.
Looks like great fun Don.Awesome catch!!!!!  .
it was worth the  wait for the photos  looks great
What? All I see is spiders.      Kidding. Thanks for taking the time to post them.
Great report...thanks for sharing that. The joy in the young folks' faces is priceless.
There are 3 possibilities here:  1) Its taken 2 years to figure out how to upload your pictures from opening day 2011 2) The time stamp is just wrong 3) Those were the days thread.
Or 4 I didn't bother setting the date on my camera. But thanks for pointing that out.
Good fishing Dawg.  It's been years since eating bass and ya know what?!?!  Might be time to try a feed for something different.  Thanks for the report.
Nothing wrong with eating a couple largies. Great report
